name: Malav Rana
headline: Software Engineer
summary: Frontend engineer with 5+ years building React, Next.js, Angular, and Vue apps. I focus on making interfaces accessible and responsive, and I work with REST and GraphQL APIs using modern tools. I'm comfortable with testing, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms.

skillDescriptions.Front-End Technologies: Modern frameworks and tools I use to build responsive, accessible interfaces.
skillDescriptions.Programming Languages: Languages I use for front-end work, backend services, and automation tasks.
skillDescriptions.Web Technologies: Build tools, API integrations, and patterns I use to create fast, interactive experiences.
skillDescriptions.Testing Libraries: Testing tools that help me ship reliable code and catch bugs early.
skillDescriptions.Environment: Tools I use for version control, deployments, and collaboration: Git, CodeCommit, AWS, Docker, and Jenkins.

highlights: Built responsive, accessible interfaces for live event platforms using HTML5, CSS, and Tailwind CSS.
Created interactive features with JavaScript and TypeScript to improve performance and make the code easier to maintain.
Built reusable components with Vue.js and React to reduce code duplication and make the front-end more scalable.
Chose the right tools for each project - mixing Vue.js, React, and Tailwind CSS based on what worked best.
Switched the team to PNPM for faster, cleaner dependency management across all projects.
Built dynamic UIs with React.js using components, hooks, and lifecycle methods for smooth navigation and state management.
Set up Redux with Redux Thunk middleware to handle async workflows and improve app performance.
Used Next.js for server-side rendering and static generation to improve SEO and page speed, with dynamic routing and API routes.
Created reusable Vue.js components and managed state with Vuex to keep UI consistent across different apps.
Wrote unit and integration tests with Jest and React Testing Library to catch bugs before releases.
Used Tailwind CSS for styling, which let me build responsive interfaces quickly.
Worked with REST APIs and GraphQL to fetch and update data efficiently.
Configured Webpack for bundling and optimization, and used Git and AWS for version control and deployments.
Built Angular reactive forms for user input and validation, and used Angular CLI to speed up development and deployments.
Designed and built interactive checkout and confirmation screens using React.js with a component-based approach.
Set up state management with React hooks and Context API to make the checkout process smoother.
Improved performance with lazy loading and code splitting to make pages load faster.
Connected REST APIs using Axios to get real-time order and prescription data.
Wrote unit and integration tests with Jest and React Testing Library to maintain code quality.
Used lifecycle methods and custom hooks to handle side effects, async operations, and reusable logic.
Worked with UX and UI designers to build responsive designs using CSS and Tailwind CSS that work on all devices.
Collaborated with other teams on Angular projects to keep components and timelines aligned.
Improved the donation platform using React.js and Angular with TypeScript to boost engagement and conversions.
Built responsive interfaces with strong data binding, custom routing, and filters to create interactive experiences.
Added features and integrations using REST APIs, Webpack, and GraphQL to improve how data flows through the app.
Worked with the front-end team using Git, AWS, Docker, and Jenkins to set up reliable deployment pipelines.
Used Jest and React Testing Library to make sure everything worked reliably and donors had a smooth experience.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
